title: Melinda Gates Receives Billions in High-Profile Divorce Settlement
summary: Melinda Gates secured a multi-billion dollar settlement in her divorce from Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, marking one of the most expensive divorce settlements in history.
content:
In a landmark divorce settlement, Melinda French Gates received billions of dollars worth of assets following her separation from Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates. The high-profile split, which was finalized in 2021, ranks among the most expensive divorce settlements ever recorded.

The settlement included transfers of various assets, including stocks, real estate, and other investments from their combined fortune that was estimated at over $130 billion at the time of their divorce announcement.

The couple, who had been married for 27 years and co-chaired the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, announced their separation in May 2021. Despite their divorce, both parties committed to continuing their philanthropic work together through the foundation, which focuses on global health, poverty reduction, and education initiatives.
